description:
reflect: TestAllocations: set GOMAXPROCS to 1

Fixes issue 3690.

messages.text:
LGTM.

However, there are more places need to be fixed. I audited all pkg/ tree
for malloc tests,
and fixed all I can find in CL 6844086.

maybe submit that and I'll abandon this one?

Cheers

Albert
